about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER

The deluxe edition does not include Episode 2 "The Pool Party" or the contents of the supporter edition.

OVERVIEW


Enjoy more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 2 'Pool Party' experience with the Deluxe Edition upgrade! The Deluxe Edition contains:

1. EXCLUSIVE WALLPAPERS OF THE GIRLS
Get 12 different exclusive 4K wallpapers featuring Chloe, Nora, Aubrey, Riley, Lindsey, Lauren, Autumn, Amber, Penelope, Ms. Rose, Samantha and Emily.

2. SEX SCENE GALLERY UNLOCKED
Gain access to a new button inside the scene gallery that allows you to unlock all the sex scenes even when you haven't played through them all in the story.

3. OFFICIAL COLLEGE KINGS 2 – EPISODE 1 WALKTHROUGH GUIDE
Get the official 170 page walkthrough guide detailing all the countless possibilities of Episode 1 to help you make the right decisions for every outcome you want. The guide is presented in gameplay screenshots, accompanied with text and various tables. In essence, it is a "play along" companion guide to achieve all the story outcomes you want.

TO ACCESS THIS EXCLUSIVE CONTENT

All exclusive content can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder: “deluxe_content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\College Kings 2) after the “deluxe_content” DLC has finished downloading.

OR

Right click \"College Kings 2\" in your Steam Library and select \"Properties\". Under the \"Local Files\" tab, select \"Browse Local Files\". Within the local files, locate a folder called \"deluxe_content\."

content_descriptors.notes: College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references that some viewers may find offensive. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are 18 years old and over. This Adult Visual Novel is not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: College Kings 2 - Episode 2 "The Pool Party" Deluxe Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enjoy more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 2 'Pool Party' experience with the Deluxe Edition upgrade! The Deluxe Edition contains exclusive wallpapers of the girls; all the sex scenes unlocked; and the official College Kings 2 - Episode 1 walkthrough guide.
